channel.title: Why are drugs illegal?
channel.description:
Just been reading some stuff and I thought it would be nice to hear why you think drugs are illegal.
The drugs I'm talking about are the Class A, B and C drugs. Why were they originally made illegal and why have they remained to be illegal and seen as morally wrong?

item.title: Why are drugs illegal?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Ckstunner:

It’s because most drugs aren’t made or grown in the US

Why are drugs illegal everywhere then? (ie. The rest of the world, or maybe you haven’t heard of that)

Read full topic

item.title: Why are drugs illegal?
item.dc:creator: @Ckstunnerscape Ckstunner
item.description:
@Ckstunnerscape wrote:

It’s because most drugs aren’t made or grown in the US

item.title: Why are drugs illegal?
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

[quote=“the fu superior, post:43, topic:251258”][quote author=N00b1 link=topic=331606.msg2601365#msg2601365 date=1230249301]
dunno why and tbh idk, i remember one time, i was up my mates farm and the next farm over got busted for growing green, so we sat in field up wind when they were burning it and got completely fucked god that was a twosome day, best thing is we still had our green left for later on the night
[/quote]
How close were you? Smelling it doesn’t get you high, you have to get close enough to enhale it. Once it goes into the air you can’t enhale in anymore.[/quote]

100 yards… seriously you have no idea how nutty it was, i get stoned like what, 3-4 times a week and i aint been wreaked like that in a long time

Read full topic

How close were you? Smelling it doesn’t get you high, you have to get close enough to enhale it. Once it goes into the air you can’t enhale in anymore.

item.title: Why are drugs illegal?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Efilite, post:36, topic:251258”]People think that if your smoking pot it… makes you paranoid, and then makes you go all nutty with some illness.
So it is worse than smoking cigarettes.[/quote]

Too bad none of it is true.

Read full topic

item.title: Why are drugs illegal?
item.dc:creator: @Wrauld Wrauld
item.description:
@Wrauld wrote:

[quote=“masta XY, post:34, topic:251258”][quote author=Tree link=topic=331606.msg2600549#msg2600549 date=1230195246]

So we came to consider that they smoke it all, they cant get rid of it that fast but its about 13 cop’s and all of them are smoker’s and smoke in the car’s

So because they are smokers, they must be doing weed? Excellent logic.

There was a conspiracy for about 2 year’s about them burrying them out at the city dump but haha… Me and some other kids from school dug around for about 6 hours and found nothing… So we came to consider that they smoke it all,

I’m pretty sure they burn it all. Because you are unable to find something, they must have used it?

One night I got pulled over for going 55mph in a 25 zone, the cop looked high and asked me if I was, i took a look in his eye’s and said nope but are you by any chance? and he gave me a $250 (USD) ticket for it…

Another fine example of you being an idiot.

I heard they are because the cop’s want it to them self’s…

I wasn’t aware that the cops were capable of making laws?

First, city law- made by the state defined, most of the city board member’s= cop’s so who the hell makes the laws?

city laws= defined for the ‘CITY’ only, government law’s still apply, so dont try to bullshit your 12 year old way in to this.

Marijuana laws are not created, governed or maintained by a board who consist mainly of police? Excuse my lack of knowledge on the US law system but i believe i am correct on this one.
[/quote]

first the government set up the law for marijuana, and the city ordnance is to bury the plant’s because supposably the pesticides that’s sprayed out there will destroy the plant’s.[/quote]
YOU CAN’T OWN WEED ITS ILLEGAL AND ALWAYS WILL BE!

GIVE UP!

Not all smokers smoke weed to let you know…And cops are prob drug tested because they’re working under the government that enforces laws and help keep peace, doubt they took the smoked the drugs anyways.

Read full topic

One night I got pulled over for going 55mph in a 25 zone, the cop looked high and asked me if I was, i took a look in his eye’s and said nope but are you by any chance? and he gave me a $250 (USD) ticket for it…

city laws= defined for the ‘CITY’ only, government law’s still apply, so dont try to bullshit your 12 year old way in to this.

item.title: Why are drugs illegal?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“masta XY, post:29, topic:251258”][quote author=Tree link=topic=331606.msg2600534#msg2600534 date=1230193992]

Just been reading some stuff and I thought it would be nice to hear why you think drugs are illegal.

The drugs I’m talking about are the Class A, B and C drugs. Why were they originally made illegal and why have they remained to be illegal and seen as morally wrong?

I heard they are because the cop’s want it to them self’s… In the town I live in its about a population of 4.5k… Not much but the biggest drug bust was with over 300 marijuana plants and they dont dispose of them… There was a conspiracy for about 2 year’s about them burrying them out at the city dump but haha… Me and some other kids from school dug around for about 6 hours and found nothing… So we came to consider that they smoke it all, they cant get rid of it that fast but its about 13 cop’s and all of them are smoker’s and smoke in the car’s… So for all we know they could be smokin weed… One night I got pulled over for going 55mph in a 25 zone, the cop looked high and asked me if I was, i took a look in his eye’s and said nope but are you by any chance? and he gave me a $250 (USD) ticket for it…

You are a complete idiot.
I hope you got absolutely nothing for Christmas.

Got more then what you will get, and how the hell am I a idiot?

Because your story is the most far fetched pile of shit i have heard in a while. All i see you doing is filling this forum up with complete garbage. Your contributions are worthless.

No you are… you do jack shit on these forum’s besides post your worthless junk, and how much proof do you want that it’s true? do you want to see the police record’s or how about the video that is from the police car… or how about the ticket or how about the new’s paper… Damn the only thing I love about this is the fact that you have no fucking idea how it is in my town if you want proof then come here…

I have reviewed your posts. You really are not in a position to tell me that i post complete rubbish. Don’t worry, i used to make up nice little stories when i was younger as well.
[/quote]

Im 17… and you want some shit proof… fine i will post every fucking image.[/quote]
If you’re 17, holy shit. Were your brother and sister married at what, 20?

Read full topic

go to http://www.linncountyleader.com/ and search marijuana… You want fucking proof.

request more proof? http://www.linncountyleader.com/archive/x304712534/Auto-parts-store-gets-unwanted-shipment-Pot

item.title: Why are drugs illegal?
item.dc:creator: @masta_XY masta XY
item.description:
@masta_XY wrote:

[quote=“Wrauld, post:21, topic:251258”][quote author=masta XY link=topic=331606.msg2600359#msg2600359 date=1230187424]

Just been reading some stuff and I thought it would be nice to hear why you think drugs are illegal.

The drugs I’m talking about are the Class A, B and C drugs. Why were they originally made illegal and why have they remained to be illegal and seen as morally wrong?

I heard they are because the cop’s want it to them self’s… In the town I live in its about a population of 4.5k… Not much but the biggest drug bust was with over 300 marijuana plants and they dont dispose of them… There was a conspiracy for about 2 year’s about them burrying them out at the city dump but haha… Me and some other kids from school dug around for about 6 hours and found nothing… So we came to consider that they smoke it all, they cant get rid of it that fast but its about 13 cop’s and all of them are smoker’s and smoke in the car’s… So for all we know they could be smokin weed… One night I got pulled over for going 55mph in a 25 zone, the cop looked high and asked me if I was, i took a look in his eye’s and said nope but are you by any chance? and he gave me a $250 (USD) ticket for it…
[/quote]
I never heard of cops disposing drugs, usually they lock it up somewhere…for some reason. Sometimes drugs can be used for medical needs, so most likely they put it in the hospital. But you never know lol.[/quote]
Obama is making it legal… And if not im going to AMSTERDAM!!!
